overview: A young girl dressed in white rolls runs and eats watermelons with abandon. The camera follows the girl's gestures incessantly. Occasional inserts such as a red umbrella, a necklace or three men pulling down their trousers, give the film a unique image of a female artist and the heroine's vibrant body. Yuko Ishimaru, who plays the leading role, is an indispensable figure in Hokkaido's independent film scene.
title: Fountain of no Water
